DOC.detailed_description: 160 youth depression comorbid insomnia initiate course SSRI antidepressant randomize insomnia-focused cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT-I ) attention control condition sleep hygiene ( SH ) education . All participant in-person treatment session complete sleep diary wear actigraph record activity level . Participants follow 12 month . Primary depression outcomes score Clinical Global Impressions Improvement ( CGI-I ) major depressive disorder diagnostic remission ; primary sleep outcome actigraphy total sleep time score Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) . Secondary outcome include additional sleep depression outcome . The study also include economic analysis .
